gameDetails.name: Potion Explosion: Fulminating Serum
gameDetails.description:
Potion Explosion: Fulminating Serum is a new potion that allows you to catch lightning in a bottle, with this promo item consisting of eight bottles to mixed with the components of the Potion Explosion base game.

Ten sets of the eight bottles are included in CMON Limited's Potion Explosion Game Night Kit.
